title: Gold V Support Main looking for Adc Main :D
body:
Hi I've recently been getting a lot of trashy ADCs and am looking for a consistent ADC Main/player.
I myself can play any support champ exceptionally well but am really experienced with: 
{{champion:12}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:201}}
Should be Silver 3 - Gold 1 but not too worried about rank :D.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 
Add Me: Darkderma
Looking to learn from mistakes and get better together not just necessarly climb.

replies.body: mmm, i'll add you and we'll have a few games in the near future, thinking about coming back to ranked again after todays games (Gold V) currently having a few problems that need fixing that i myself can't find.. might be able to do some good.
Sounds good I'll be on tomorrow :D
alrighty :) i'm also an adc main btw.
